attributes.action: Hold a referendum to choose the future format of the House of Lords, so that the public, not politicians, can determine our form of government.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that an issue as important as what form of government we have over us should be decided by a full referendum of all eligible voters, and not by whatever mix of politicians happen to be in Parliament at a moment in time.  This is a major constitutional issue - in other democratic countries such issues are decided by referendum, and they should be here too.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
